buttress buildings started in the [[Gawra]] [[Ubaid]] period with tripartite houses:  
![](https://github.com/pannous/images/blob/ff9b2c762671c275c82e5e1f0dc6af4189fe9dcf/IMG_2666.jpg)  

They developed into semi-official guest reception houses and finally into monumental state architecture:  
![](https://github.com/pannous/images/blob/899a1e64f92f5adf83f1b90acfbc8cff142837c8/uruk_temple.jpg)  

![](https://github.com/pannous/images/blob/ff9b2c762671c275c82e5e1f0dc6af4189fe9dcf/buttress%203.jpg)
